Articles.Content:
<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gSh1zW6KH9U?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

A new corporation has taken command of KSP HQ. It's time for an exciting rescue mission!  

*A KSP cinematic series featuring the crew of the BHDL Relapse as they attempt to rescue stranded kerbonauts Jebediah and Bill from the Mun.*
